# OpenStack最终用户文档（简体中文版）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/openstack-zuizhong-yonghuwendang-jiantizhongwenban
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/openstack-zuizhong-yonghuwendang-jiantizhongwenban
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install openstack-zuizhong-yonghuwendang-jiantizhongwenban
openstack-zuizhong-yonghuwendang-jiantizhongwenban <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g openstack-zuizhong-yonghuwendang-jiantizhongwenban
openstack-zuizhong-yonghuwendang-jiantizhongwenban <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
